p: The percentage inhibition of violacein pigment synthesis by C. violaceum CV12472 was evaluated at MIC and sub-MIC concentrations and reported in Table 3. X. aethiopica inhibited violacein production better than M. myristica, as it percentage inhibition of violacein varied from 80.5% ± 3.0% at MIC to 5.6 ± 0.2 at MIC/8 as compared to M. myristica with 75.1% ± 2.5% at MIC and 15.5% ± 1.1% at MIC/4. At MIC/16, no inhibition was observed.
